channel.title: powerbi on Paul-Razvan Sarbu
channel.description: Recent content in powerbi on Paul-Razvan Sarbu

item.title: Six Sigma - Part Two
item.description: Deneb - VEGA Lite The Power BI out-of-the-box Scatter Plot visual is very good, however it lacks a key feature that I needed to better represent crew actions such as using SVGs.

item.title: Six Sigma - Part One
item.description: Abusing Excel End of 2022, I have been tasked to prepare the forms for Six Sigma time study. After looking at previous similar work, done by my peers, I have realised that it’s a mad man’s job.

item.title: Process Improvement
item.description: Note that the data in the chart above is fictional This how I (re)started Although I’ve graduated the IT high school in 2001 as Junior Analyst, Programmer I didn’t pursue a career in the IT world until I have rediscovered my passion for coding when become a Line Manager in 2016.
